CustomField.description: Viser link til stilling. Brukes i stedet for auto number i related lists etc.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(TAG_Category__c,""), HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/"+Id+"/view", "Avtale - "+ TAG_Account__r.Name, "_self"), HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/"+Id+"/view", TEXT(TAG_Category__c)+ " - "+ TAG_Account__r.Name, "_self") )
CustomField.label: Contract Title
